name: Baskt.Fun
description: baskt.fun revolutionizes narrative investing by offering single-token indices that track emerging market themes. Our smart-contract powered baskets automatically capture momentum across sectors like AI, DeSci, and memes, eliminating the need to manage multiple positions. Whether you're chasing the next billion-dollar memecoin or investing in breakthrough technologies, baskt.fun gives you instant, diversified exposure to crypto's hottest narratives. Trade smarter, not harder - let our indices do the work while you capture the upside.
